games.summary: CLEVELAND -- —Cade Cunninghamscored 27 points,Daniss Jenkinsadded 25 — 21 in the second quarter alone — and theDetroit Pistonsheld on down the stretch for a rare road win at Cleveland, beating the Cavaliers 114-110 on Sunday. Cleveland's Darius Garland scored 16 but went 0 for 7 on 3-pointers.Evan MobleyandSam Merrilladded 15 points apiece for t...
blurbs: 📋 Paul Reed (DET) made just his 3rd start this season. 8 pts, 8 reb.

games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla. -- —Desmond Banescored 31 points,Paolo Bancheroadded 28 points and 12 rebounds and theOrlando Magichanded theIndiana Pacerstheir 12th straight loss, 135-127 on Sunday.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jase Richardson (ORL) played 27 min (season avg: 11). 12 pts, 1 reb, 4 ast.

📋 Johnny Furphy (IND) made just his 4th start this season. 2 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: He was traded to Brooklyn in the offseason for Cam Johnson and came in averaging a career-high 25.8 points. He scored nine points in the second quarter and Brooklyn led 59-52 at halftime after Murray's jumper with 0.2 seconds to play.
blurbs: 📋 Day'Ron Sharpe (BKN) made just his 2nd start this season. 17 pts, 6 reb.
📋 DaRon Holmes II (DEN) made just his 2nd start this season. 6 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: Trey Murphy IIIreturned from a one-game absence because of back spasms and scored 27 points, whileJeremiah Fearsadded 21 for the Pelicans. The Heat outscored the Pelicans 31-11 in fast break points and had a season-high 19 steals.
blurbs: 🆕 Karlo Matkovic (NO) made his first start of the season. 24 min, 4 pts.

games.summary: WASHINGTON -- —Anthony Edwardsscored 35 points,Julius Randleadded 22, and theMinnesota Timberwolvescompleted a season sweep of theWashington Wizardswith a 141-115 rout on Sunday night. Rudy Goberthad 18 points and 14 rebounds for his 15th double-double of the season for Minnesota, which outscored Washington 76-48 in the paint.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jaylen Clark (MIN) played 28 min (season avg: 14). 12 pts, 2 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: PHOENIX -- —Devin Bookerhit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 0.7 seconds remaining,Jordan Goodwinscored 26 points with a career-high eight 3-pointers and thePhoenix Sunsbeat theOklahoma City Thunder108-105 on Sunday night.
